title: Turkey Red - Harry Krause "no ad" back PSA
author: Jay Wolt

posts.post_title: Turkey Red - Harry Krause "no ad" back PSA
posts.post_content:
Have an affordable T3 Turkey Red with the rare checklist back that doesn't
have the info or address on it.
These are called "no ad" backs and are the toughest of all back configurations.

The card is graded a PSA-Authentic though it doesn't look trimmed.
So its very pleasing to the eye. I've had some other Authentics missing
chunks of the card and some with major paper loss.
Also not, the stain on the front is more vibrant in the scan then it is in person.

Just $195 dlvd via Priority mail in a box
Paypal OK, no fee

Email:  [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url] 

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/12123070.jpg[/IMG]
